name: MIDNIGHT WITH MONSTERS
description:
Midnight with Monsters Is a game where the player must complete a set of objectives with managing the distance between you and... Well... IT using your phone to stun it on occasion when it gets to close. 

▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

1. Collect all five Teddys left behind by your friends that were killed when you arrived at the woods. Them leaving Teddys are merely a fraction of what they used to be

2. Burn them in your campfire. Set free your friends to not disappoint

▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

IT what is that. IT does have a name given to it by the USCF  (us containment facilitys)

MW10001 or The Ripper. How It got out is only known by some...
